campaigns.title: useSelector
campaigns.short_description: The optional comparison function also enables using something like Lodash's _.isEqual() or Immutable.js's comparison capabilities.

campaigns.title: Meet - AI Virtual Background 4K Webcam
campaigns.short_description:
The first-ever 4K webcam that embeded AI technology to
protect your background during video calls.
campaigns.content:
Capture everything in 4k, with extended battery life and pro-g

inspired features. Choose from three 4k recording modes: UHD,

HD and cinematic 24p. Use the Wi-Fi feature to connect and stream

your footage wirelessly directly to your iOS and Android smartphones

or tablets for instant sharing. The monitor has a 3.5" touch screen

for easy navigation and built-in wifi that automatically connects

to the last used smartphone or tablet once paired.



Built with an advanced 4K image sensor and a Super 35 imaging

processer the GH4 is able to capture cinema quality images

with astonishing detail. This camera has evolved into a great

all-rounder for photography or filmmaking.


Digital Cameras

  1. Images can be instantly checked, and retaken if necessary.
  2. .Black and White and sepia-tone photos can be easily created.
  3. Macro photography lets you shoot down to a few centimeters away.
  4. Most digital cameras can also take moving pictures.
  5. No film purchase or development costs, Rechargeable battery packs are economicalðŸ¤‘ðŸ¤‘ðŸ¤‘.
  6. Macro photography lets you shoot down to a few centimeters away.
